bibl.title: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Eugenia Hook Carter, November 17, 1918

div1.p: Carter discusses his travel plans and the end of World War I.

div1.head: Letter from Henry Rose Carter to Laura Eugenia Hook Carter, November 17, 1918
div1.opener:
I am much interested in knowing
if Mr. Reid Came yesterday & if so
of the resut of his visit
H.R. C
I will mail in at Beaumont or
at N.C,
The Plaza
Port Arthur, Texas
Novem 17, 1918
My Dear Wife:
div1.p:
I went down to Sabine
- a God forsaken place,- yester-
day & got back here last night
- by Automobile. I will not
have to go to Galveston - but
will leave for N.O. about
4. P. M. today, reaching it
tomorrow morning.- say - 9 to
11 AM,. That is as far as I can
2
tell just now of my movements.
So far as this detail is concerned
I should be able to start for
Baltimore Tuesday evening
but whether - I will or not I
cannot at present say. I pur-
pose in any case to go by &
see Henry at Camp Green-
leaf- this would make a delay
of - say - 2 days en route.

Tell Laura that there is a
picture - in “Motion Picture Mag”
for Decem. “Lilian Walker” is my en-
try - which is, I suspect, very like what
3
Miss Claire Whedbee must
have been.

I read the Current History
of the Times N.Y. Times & a
copy of the Review of Reviews.
- the last one, & enjoyed them
I am still “rejoiced”- no
other word expresses it - over
the result of the war - It is
not the end, it is the result
that I rejoice at. For it I could
have stood for its continu-
ance indefinitely - although
very glad that it is over
N
The Plaza
Port Arthur, Texas
For the result & that it has
ended I do most earnestly
thank God, I am glad all
the time for it. Just as it
was a great sin threat of evil
underlying all things & ever
sub present subconsciously
no matter what else was hap-
pening to so it there is now
a cause of gratulation un-
derlying all things- A blessing
to be thankful for at all
times no matter what other
little things of good will
may
5
The Plaza
Port Arthur, Texas
may be happening- They are
just the the little waves
& hollows on the crest of a
great roller which scarcely
ef affect the elevation of
the water. Surely I am
glad & grateful to God.
Also I went to the house to talk
about it.- only that is only a
wavelet - which does not affect
the height of the sea-
